Method Detail

getStream

java.io.OutputStream getStream()
Returns an OutputStream by which the content of the model can be written by a text producer from an internally created model. It is expected to be written in an RDF/XML format.

Returns:
OutputStream for the RDF. Should be closed at the end, and should not be used more than once. To write the RDF again, this method must be called again.

setRdf

void setRdf(java.lang.String rdf)
Sets the model content from an RDF string in RDF/XML format.

setModel

void setModel(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model model)
Sets the model managed by this handle to the specified model thus replacing the entire model content of this handle. That allows a quick change of content although it has to be done in great care.

Parameters:
model -
